references:
The roulette has 37 pockets from 0 through 36, to which the AI agent decides on which bet type out of <math alttext="K" class="ltx_Math" display="inline" id="S3.SS1.p2.1.m1.1">
  <semantics id="S3.SS1.p2.1.m1.1a">

    </annotation-xml>
    <annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="S3.SS1.p2.1.m1.1c">K</annotation>
    <annotation encoding="application/x-llamapun" id="S3.SS1.p2.1.m1.1d">italic_K</annotation>
  </semantics>
</math> choices to use with a $1 bet.
